tool.name: SAGA.ta_hydrology.2
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayELEVATION False isArraySINKROUTE False isArrayWEIGHTS False isArrayVAL_INPUT False isArrayACCU_MATERIAL False isArrayACCU_TARGET False output_data_FLOW $output_data_FLOW output_data_VAL_MEAN $output_data_VAL_MEAN output_data_ACCU_TOTAL $output_data_ACCU_TOTAL output_data_ACCU_LEFT $output_data_ACCU_LEFT output_data_ACCU_RIGHT $output_data_ACCU_RIGHT name SAGA.ta_hydrology.2 ELEVATION $ELEVATION SINKROUTE $SINKROUTE WEIGHTS $WEIGHTS VAL_INPUT $VAL_INPUT ACCU_MATERIAL $ACCU_MATERIAL ACCU_TARGET $ACCU_TARGET STEP $STEP FLOW_UNIT $FLOW_UNIT METHOD $METHOD CORRECT $CORRECT MINDQV $MINDQV prefer $prefer response $response outputType_FLOW $OutputSection_FLOW.outputType_FLOW transmissionMode_FLOW $OutputSection_FLOW.transmissionMode_FLOW outputType_VAL_MEAN $OutputSection_VAL_MEAN.outputType_VAL_MEAN transmissionMode_VAL_MEAN $OutputSection_VAL_MEAN.transmissionMode_VAL_MEAN outputType_ACCU_TOTAL $OutputSection_ACCU_TOTAL.outputType_ACCU_TOTAL transmissionMode_ACCU_TOTAL $OutputSection_ACCU_TOTAL.transmissionMode_ACCU_TOTAL outputType_ACCU_LEFT $OutputSection_ACCU_LEFT.outputType_ACCU_LEFT transmissionMode_ACCU_LEFT $OutputSection_ACCU_LEFT.transmissionMode_ACCU_LEFT outputType_ACCU_RIGHT $OutputSection_ACCU_RIGHT.outputType_ACCU_RIGHT transmissionMode_ACCU_RIGHT $OutputSection_ACCU_RIGHT.transmissionMode_ACCU_RIGHT

param.name: ELEVATION
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: SINKROUTE
param.label: Sink Routes
param.help: Sink Routes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: WEIGHTS
param.label: Weights
param.help: Weights The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: VAL_INPUT
param.label: Input for Mean over Catchment
param.help: Input for Mean over Catchment The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: ACCU_MATERIAL
param.label: Material for Accumulation
param.help: Material for Accumulation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: ACCU_TARGET
param.label: Accumulation Target
param.help: Accumulation Target The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: STEP
param.label: Step
param.help: For testing purposes. Only generate flow at cells with step distance (each step row/column).

param.name: MINDQV
param.label: DEMON - Min. DQV
param.help: DEMON - Minimum Drainage Quota Volume (DQV) for traced flow tubes

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_FLOW
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_VAL_MEAN
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_ACCU_TOTAL
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_ACCU_LEFT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

section.name: OutputSection_ACCU_RIGHT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Flow tracing algorithms for calculations of flow accumulation and related parameters. These algorithms trace the flow of each cell in a DEM separately until it finally leaves the DEM or ends in a sink.<br/>The Rho 8 implementation (Fairfield & Leymarie 1991) adopts the original algorithm only for the flow routing and will give quite different results.
